api/feeds/image-proxy.php.description: PHP image proxy endpoint that fetches external images with proper Referer header (set to image origin domain) to bypass hotlink protection. Includes SSRF prevention via filter_var with FILTER_FLAG_NO_PRIV_RANGE, MIME type verification, 5MB size limit, and browser-like User-Agent.

src/components/common/FeedImage.tsx.description: Reusable FeedImage component with error state handling. Props: src (string|null|undefined), alt, className, fallbackElement (ReactNode). Uses getProxiedImageUrl to route through image proxy. Shows fallbackElement when no src or on error.
